description: At our crew's den the fun never stops and again we find Sebastian and Kelvin Summers role playing but this time it's all about pain and just how much Kelvin can stand. Doctor Sebastian keeps adding pegs to Kelvin's slim body until the only space left is Kelvin's cock and balls. The end result is amazing and Kelvin screams as Sebastian removes all the pegs and pinches the red marks left behind.
title: Kelvin Summers & Sebastian Kane
